51812.affected_area: Steinbach, Niverville, St Adolphe and Ile Des Chenes
live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians will work to repair services through the night and are currently unable to provide an ETA. We apologize for any inconvenience and thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51812.summary: Some customers in Steinbach, Nivervile, St Adolphe and Ile Des Chenes  are experiencing an interruption to  Television services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51812.title: July 21 - Steinbach, Niverville, St Adolphe and Ile Des Chenes | Television Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
